Available for Frontend & Mobile Consulting

Mastering the
Digital Craft.

I am a Senior Ionic & Angular Developer dedicated to building high-performance, mobile-first digital experiences.

With over 6 years of specialized experience in the Angular & Ionic ecosystems, I bridge the gap between creative design and enterprise-scale mobile performance. My philosophy centers on engineering fluid interfaces—leveraging modern reactive patterns, strict type safety, and mobile-first design to deliver applications that feel native on every device.
